title: VALORANT
description: Valorant is a team-based first-person tactical hero shooter set in the near future. Players play as one of a set of Agents, characters based on several countries and cultures around the world. In the main game mode, players are assigned to either the attacking or defending team with each team having five players on it.

title: League of Legends
description: League of Legends is a team-based strategy game where two teams of five powerful champions face off to destroy the other's base. Choose from over 140 champions to make epic plays, secure kills, and take down towers as you battle your way to victory.

title: Legends of Runeterra
description: Legends of Runeterra is a free-to-play strategy card game set in the world of League of Legends. It features cards based on the iconic champions of League of Legends, as well as new characters and allies hailing from the regions of Runeterra, each with their own style and strategic advantage.

title: Teamfight Tactics (TFT)
description: Teamfight Tactics is an autobattler: a round-based PvP game where you'll draft a team that battles automatically on your behalf, featuring iconic champions from League of Legends. Your goal? Grow your team and protect your board to become the last player standing.

title: Minecraft
description: Minecraft is a sandbox game that allows players to explore, build, and survive in a blocky, procedurally-generated world. With endless possibilities and creative freedom, it has become one of the best-selling games of all time.

title: Forza Horizon 4
description: Forza Horizon 4 is an open-world racing game set in a fictional representation of the United Kingdom. With dynamic seasons, a vast car roster, and stunning visuals, it offers an immersive racing experience for players of all skill levels.

title: Sea of Thieves
description: Sea of Thieves is a pirate-themed action-adventure game where players can explore a vast open world, engage in naval battles, and search for hidden treasure. With its cooperative multiplayer gameplay, it offers a unique and immersive pirate experience.

title: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
description: Halo: The Master Chief Collection is a compilation of first-person shooter games from the Halo series. With enhanced graphics, multiplayer modes, and all previously released campaigns, it offers a comprehensive Halo experience for both new and returning players.

title: Gears 5
description: Gears 5 is a third-person shooter game set in the Gears of War universe. With intense combat, a compelling story, and a variety of multiplayer modes, it offers an action-packed experience for fans of the series.

title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
description: Ori and the Will of the Wisps is a platform-adventure game where players control Ori, a guardian spirit, as they navigate through a beautiful and perilous world. With stunning visuals, emotional storytelling, and challenging gameplay, it offers an unforgettable experience.

title: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition
description: Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition is a remastered version of the classic real-time strategy game. With enhanced graphics, new content, and improved gameplay, it offers both nostalgia for fans of the original and a fresh experience for newcomers.
developer: Forgotten Empires, Tantalus Media, Wicked Witch

title: State of Decay 2
description: State of Decay 2 is an open-world zombie survival game where players must build and manage a community of survivors in a post-apocalyptic world. With its focus on resource management and strategic decision-making, it offers a challenging and immersive survival experience.

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator
description: Microsoft Flight Simulator is a stunningly realistic flight simulation game that allows players to pilot a variety of aircraft across the entire globe. With breathtaking graphics and accurate physics, it offers an immersive experience for both aviation enthusiasts and casual players alike.

title: Cuphead
description: Cuphead is a challenging run-and-gun platformer inspired by 1930s cartoons. With its unique art style, classic boss battles, and jazz soundtrack, it offers a nostalgic and exhilarating gaming experience.

title: The Sims 4
description: The Sims 4 is a popular life simulation game where players create and control virtual characters, build homes, and pursue various activities and relationships. With endless possibilities for creativity and storytelling, it offers a unique and engaging gameplay experience.

title: Battlefield V
description: Battlefield V is a first-person shooter set during World War II, featuring large-scale multiplayer battles and immersive single-player War Stories. With realistic graphics, diverse gameplay modes, and extensive customization options, it offers an intense and authentic combat experience.

title: Apex Legends
description: Apex Legends is a free-to-play battle royale game set in the Titanfall universe, featuring fast-paced combat, unique character abilities, and squad-based gameplay. With its innovative ping system and dynamic map changes, it offers a fresh take on the genre.

title: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
description: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order is an action-adventure game set in the Star Wars universe, following the story of a young Jedi Padawan named Cal Kestis. With its engaging narrative, intense lightsaber combat, and exploration of iconic locations, it offers an immersive Star Wars experience.

title: Titanfall 2
description: Titanfall 2 is a fast-paced first-person shooter that combines fluid parkour movement with mech-based combat. With its thrilling multiplayer modes and captivating single-player campaign, it offers a dynamic and adrenaline-fueled gameplay experience.

title: FIFA 21
description: FIFA 21 is a popular football simulation game that offers realistic gameplay, extensive career modes, and immersive online features. With its authentic presentation and innovative gameplay improvements, it provides an unparalleled football experience for players of all skill levels.

title: Need for Speed Heat
description: Need for Speed Heat is a high-octane racing game set in the fictional open-world of Palm City, where players compete in illicit street races and evade the law during the day and night. With its adrenaline-fueled gameplay and extensive customization options, it offers a thrilling racing experience.

title: Plants vs. Zombies: Battle for Neighborville
description: Plants vs. Zombies: Battle for Neighborville is a wacky third-person shooter game where players can choose to join the Plants or Zombies in their ongoing battle for suburbia. With its colorful characters, diverse maps, and fun-filled gameplay, it offers a lighthearted and entertaining experience for all ages.

title: Anthem
description: Anthem is an action-RPG set in a vast open-world where players control powerful exosuits known as Javelins and embark on cooperative missions to explore and fight hostile forces. With its stunning visuals and dynamic gameplay, it offers a captivating sci-fi experience.

title: Mass Effect: Andromeda
description: Mass Effect: Andromeda is an action-RPG set in the Andromeda galaxy, where players take on the role of a Pathfinder tasked with exploring new worlds and unraveling the mysteries of a hostile alien species. With its expansive universe and engaging narrative, it offers an immersive sci-fi adventure.

title: Dragon Age: Inquisition
description: Dragon Age: Inquisition is an epic action-RPG set in a fantasy world on the brink of chaos. Players assume the role of the Inquisitor and lead a team of heroes on a quest to restore order and save the world from a supernatural threat. With its deep story, strategic combat, and expansive world, it offers a memorable gaming experience.
